## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines (see CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have kept functions under 50 lines where possible
- [ ] I have avoided duplicate code (DRY principle)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases
- [ ] I have tested error handling

### Frontend Specific (if applicable)

- [ ] I have used UI library components (no raw HTML elements)
- [ ] I have avoided hydration errors
- [ ] I have optimized for performance (SSR/ISR where applicable)
- [ ] I have tested in multiple browsers
- [ ] I have tested responsive design

### Backend Specific (if applicable)

- [ ] I have followed proper error handling patterns
- [ ] I have validated all inputs
- [ ] I have implemented proper logging
- [ ] I have considered security implications (SQL injection, XSS, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated API documentation if needed

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have updated schema documentation
- [ ] I have created database migrations
- [ ] I have tested migration up and down
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated inline documentation
- [ ] I have updated API documentation (if applicable)

### Build & Deploy

- [ ] Build passes locally (`npm run build` or `go build`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint` or `golangci-lint run`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (if TypeScript)
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] I have reviewed the diff before submitting
